critique: The document pertains to the transfer of administrative responsibilities related to rubber producing facilities from the Rubber Producing Facilities Disposal Commission to the Federal Facilities Corporation. It outlines the scope of authority transferred, including contracts of sale or lease, and specifies the role of the Secretary of Defense in administering national security clauses within these contracts. The order also addresses the transfer of records, property, liabilities, employees, and unexpended funds to the Corporation. Finally, it stipulates that all matters under the Corporation's jurisdiction are subject to the direction and control of the Secretary of the Treasury.
